structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY GOVERNMENT (FISCAL COURTS AND COUNTY COMMISSIONERS)

law.text: Any person who violates any provision of KRS 67.082 relating to the use of poisons shall be fined not less than fifty dollars ($50), nor more than five hundred dollars ($500), or imprisoned for not less than ten (10) days, nor more than three (3) months, or both.
